name: Bear With Me (itch)
description:
It's Sunday! That means there are no tourists in the park and you, the bear, are free to walk around and enjoy the day.

You can click on your to-do list to check your goals, but this is a short game about exploring and relaxing so don't rush.

--- made in a couple of days for #bearjam ---

"F" toggles fullscreen. "M" toggles audio. You do everything else with your mouse.

game by: ludipe

music by: Nik Sudan, Etherealwinds, Frankum & Mastabrad
